precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible with the mouse cursor in view.
expected_results: No immediate changes will be visible on the screen.

precondition: The "Start" button is visible on the left side of the taskbar.
expected_results: The "Start" menu will expand, displaying a list of programs, folders, and system options such as "My Documents", "My Computer", "Control Panel", "All Programs", "Log Off", and "Turn Off Computer".

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open and visible.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open in 'Icon View', obscuring the Start Menu.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and displaying icons.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the user interface.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is active and in focus.
expected_results: No visible changes will occur in the Control Panel window.

precondition: The "Add or Remove Programs" icon in the Windows XP Control Panel is visible.
action: Press the 'p' key and then the 'o' key.
expected_results: The tooltip for the "Add or Remove Programs" icon will disappear.

precondition: The "Windows XP Control Panel" window is open and the "Address" bar is visible.
The "Control Panel" window is open and the close button is visible in the title bar.
action: Click the close button in the title bar of the "Control Panel" window.
